text: Swati Kapoor is an Indian television, film actress . She made her television debut as Rachana, the female lead, in the serial Kaali – Ek Agnipariksha. She made her debut in feature films with Punjabi film Mr & Mrs 420. She made her Bollywood debut in 2016 with Fuddu. She rose into fame after playing the Parallel Lead Role of Saraswati/Saras Toshniwal/Rathi opposite Kabeer Kumar in Star Plus Show Tu Sooraj, Main Saanjh Piyaji. ==Early life== Swati is originally from Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh.
